description:
At the Buckingham Barrera Law Firm in Midland, Texas, we are dedicated to helping personal injury victims. Our attorneys handle a range of cases that include car crashes, accidents on oil fields, truck collisions and medical malpractice. We serve people throughout New Mexico, assisting them in seeking just compensation from all responsible parties. Our staff treats each case differently, as we realize that every person’s situation and needs are unique.

 

Each of our attorneys has a different background and experience, and we use this information to carefully match them with cases that will benefit the most from their knowledge. One of our partners is also a medical doctor, which provides us with a wealth of information of how to speak with the medical community to obtain the information we need. At Buckingham Barrera Law Firm, our lawyers know how to aggressively represent our clients’ rights, and we are always prepared to go to trial if need be.

 

During a free initial consultation, we sit down with people to gather information about their situation, and provide them with fair and honest answers to their questions. In matters concerning a severe injury, such as a brain injury, or a wrongful death, our law firm can look at future needs, mental and emotional impact, loss of financial support and the challenges that the family faces to calculate the maximum amount of financial compensation. We also accept credit cards in order to keep clients’ worries to a minimum.
